text: Dughiar mamɨn, Israelian Atrivim Ahasia, uan dɨpenimɨn azuarim pɨn aperaghav iti. Azuarir kamɨn bɨrim akariaghɨrɨzɨ, Ahasia nguazim girɨgha bar kufi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a gumazir maba amada, eghtɨ me Filistian kantrin itir nguibar ekiam Ekronɨn mangɨ Ekronɨn asem Balsebup, an azangsɨgh fogh suam, a ua deragh otogham, o puvatɨgham.
